description: This table contains the external formulary ID values.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: EXT_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the external formulary that is associated with this patient encounter.

columns.name: EXT_ALT_ID
columns.description: This unique ID of the external alternative formulary associated with this patient encounter.

columns.name: EXT_PHARM_CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the external pharmacy coverage associated with this patient encounter.

columns.name: EXT_COPAY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the external copay associated with this patient encounter.

columns.name: EXT_FORM_ID_LINE
columns.description: This column contains the external formulary ID line.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_RX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pharmacy coverage type category number for this patient encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Retail


Mail Order


Retail+Mail
